data.message: I am sick and tired of all the vulgarity on facebook, some of the pages you allow are very vulgar. I don't get on facebook to see all this vulgarity, I use facebook to to keep in touch with Family and Friends

replies.message: Hey Roseann. If you come across a Page that violates the Facebook Terms, please report it. To submit a report, go to the Page you want to report and click the drop-down below the Page's cover. Then select Report Page and follow the on-screen directions to file a report. Thank you. -Chantal
I have and apparently they are vulgar enough for you to remove them...
I've reported pages only to be told that they don't meet the requirements. How vulgar does something have to be?
Alisha...I agree how vulgar does it have to be...

Ladies you can block anything you don't like to see. Right upper corner of the page allows you to block and give your reason if you wish. Kinda like your tv, you have the option of turning the channel...
It's called freedom of speech, buddy. Ever heard of it?
Bruce, I'm not gonna dignify that with an answer...
